name: DDTAN by 111%
description:
111% 7th game DDTAN!!!
Destroy the bricks before they become 10!!
Use a variety of balls to break the bricks(special skills added)
The angle is key point!1
This is a simple and addictive arkanoid game.
How long can you survive on DDTAN?

Simple, but Addictive
DDTAN by 111%
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Game Features:
- Unlock 30 balls, including some unique balls like golf ball, cat ball, baseball etc.
- Challenge your friends with Game Center support.
- Easy and fun to play.
- Check our facebook page, 111%, to get hidden ball.
- Physical game engine used.
- Colorful UI, Fun sound effects, Attractive character.
BBTAN, CCTAN, POPONG!, Charles, CtrlCV, Good night RUDY and DDTAN!
Share your screenshots online SNS such as Facebook or Instagram.
Enjoy DDTAN while you commute, on a date, in the bus or subway, waiting at the bank and so on. Anytime, anywhere you can play DDTNA!!11
